title: Fonzci Heated Socks, Washable Battery Operated Heated Socks for Women and Men Electric Heated Socks Rechargeable Battery for Snowing Camping Walking Fishing Foot Warmer
features: Breath material: The battery heating socks are made of high -quality cotton materials, softs and elastic. When heating your feet, it will also be breathable, which will not make your feet feel any discomfort.

Battery Power: 3VDC battery box power supply (excluding battery), please select AA alkaline battery or 1.5V to charge AA batteries. Other types of batteries cannot provide power supply. The heating temperature is about 50 °C (122 °F), and the toes and insoles are heated.

Washing Electric Heating Socks: This detachable battery heating socks is insulated and waterproof design. After unloading the battery, you can wash or wash it by hand. To protect the wires, make sure to put the socks in the laundry bag when using the washing machine.

Multi -Function Heating Socks: Heating socks are suitable for various outdoor sports, such as skiing, hiking, hunting, hunting, fishing, fishing, riding bicycles, skating, motorcycles, etc. Anyone who lives outdoors or live at low temperature can use these electric heating socks to get fun in the cold.
Creative Gifts: This kind of mens and womens universal charging heating socks are ideal gifts for your family or friends. You can maintain the warmth of family, parents and friends in cold weather.
